title: Between the Scenes - Trump Doesn't Even Try to Hide His Scandals
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - Trump Doesn't Even Try to Hide His Scandals
description:
Trevor marvels at how the shameless Trump administration makes no attempt to keep its scandals under wraps.
